body:
### Code Quality :: Indentation Style Issue ###

Please be consistent in indentation style. At the moment, there are mixes of tab and space indentation. See this screenshot (`.` (dot) represent space, `->` (arrow) represent tab indentation):

![2017-05-28 16_57_27-● index.html - project 7 neighbourhood map new folder - Visual Studio Code.jpg](https://udacity-reviews-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/_attachments/10086/1495954659/2017-05-28_16_57_27-__index.html_-_project_7_neighbourhood_map_new_folder_-_Visual_Studio_Code.jpg)

Each code editor software has its own setting to help fixing this. Please research relevant information for your code editor to fix this issue.

### Code Quality ###
Code doesn't pass [HTML Validator](https://validator.w3.org/#validate_by_input), see screenshot and please fix the addressed issues:


![2017-05-28 16_56_40-Showing results for contents of text-input area - Nu Html Checker.jpg](https://udacity-reviews-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/_attachments/10086/1495954609/2017-05-28_16_56_40-Showing_results_for_contents_of_text-input_area_-_Nu_Html_Checker.jpg)

### Code Quality ###
This code block has inconsistent indentation

## Tip :zap: ##
All ``<script>`` should be at the bottom of the HTML body for *Page Speed Optimization*.

Just make sure to pay attention to the _order of `<script>` tag_, otherwise __the app may break__

### Reference ###
- Please refer to [Website Performance Optimization course @Udacity](https://www.udacity.com/course/viewer#!/c-ud884)
Nice job binding _KO observables_ to the DOM to manipulate them in an MVVM pattern!
